headline: CenterPoint readies for second major cold snap of 2025 and is deploying its cold weather readiness plan
summary: Pre-winter readiness actions completed by the company in December; crews performing readiness checklists for electric and natural gas systemsCustomers urged to have a plan and make preparations for...
